headline: Stablecoin Rewards Resemble Traditional Loyalty Programs, Says Circle CEO
summary: The annual payouts on stablecoins offered by crypto platforms are similar in nature to loyalty and reward programs found in traditional products, Circle Internet Group Chief Executive Jeremy Allaire said on Thursday.  “Our view is we are talking about some different interests, navigating specific language around rewards systems, [that] seems like a solvable problem.”
